languages.text: "Да свершится Правосудие Императора! Презренный еретик и нечестивый ксенос, ваш приговор — смерть!"
"Let the Emperor's justice be served! You contemptible heretic and you unholy xenos, your sentence is death!"
languages.original_text: "Да свершится Правосудие Императора! Презренный еретик и нечестивый ксенос, ваш приговор — смерть!"

traits.locale_text: "Let the Emperor's justice be served! You, contemptible heretic, and you, unholy xenos — your sentence is death!"
"Let the Emperor's justice be served! You, contemptible heretic, and you, unholy xenos — your sentence is death!"
"Let the Emperor's justice be served! You contemptible heretic and you unholy xenos, your sentence is death!"
"Let the Emperor's justice be served! You contemptible heretic and you unholy xenos, your sentence is death!"
"Let the Emperor's justice be served! You contemptible heretic and you unholy xenos, your sentence is death!"
"Let the Emperor's justice be served! You contemptible heretic and you unholy xenos, your sentence is death!"

languages.text: 「皇帝の裁きを受けよ！軽蔑すべき異端者、そして穢らわしい異種族め。お前たちは死刑だ！」
languages.original_text: "Let the Emperor's justice be served! You contemptible heretic and you unholy xenos, your sentence is death!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の裁きを受けよ！軽蔑すべき異端者、そして穢らわしい異種族め。お前たちは死刑だ！」

languages.text: “为了帝皇！为了胜利！你这该死的异端分子，你这邪恶的异形！我们要判处你死刑！”
languages.original_text: "Let the Emperor's justice be served! You contemptible heretic and you unholy xenos, your sentence is death!"

traits.locale_text: “为了帝皇！为了胜利！你这该死的异端分子，你这邪恶的异形！我们要判处你死刑！”

languages.text: «¡Que se sirva la justicia del Emperador! ¡Herejes despreciables y xenos impíos, vuestra sentencia es la muerte!».
languages.original_text: "Let the Emperor's justice be served! You contemptible heretic and you unholy xenos, your sentence is death!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que se sirva la justicia del Emperador! ¡Herejes despreciables y xenos impíos, vuestra sentencia es la muerte!».

languages.text: "Die Gerechtigkeit des Imperators soll geschehen! Widerwärtiger Ketzer und unheiliger Xenos, Eure Strafe ist der Tod!"
languages.original_text: "Let the Emperor's justice be served! You contemptible heretic and you unholy xenos, your sentence is death!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Gerechtigkeit des Imperators soll geschehen! Widerwärtiger Ketzer und unheiliger Xenos, Eure Strafe ist der Tod!"

languages.text: « Que la justice de l'Empereur soit rendue ! Votre sentence, maudits hérétiques et xénos impies, est la mort ! »
languages.original_text: "Let the Emperor's justice be served! You contemptible heretic and you unholy xenos, your sentence is death!"

traits.locale_text: « Que la justice de l'Empereur soit rendue ! Votre sentence, maudits hérétiques et xénos impies, est la mort ! »

languages.text: "İmparator'un adaleti yerini bulsun! Rezil, kâfir ve günahkâr zenoların cezası ölümdür!"
languages.original_text: "Let the Emperor's justice be served! You contemptible heretic and you unholy xenos, your sentence is death!"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un adaleti yerini bulsun! Sen rezil kâfir ve günahkâr zenonun cezası ölüm!"
